settings.text:
Dubai offers an unmatched array of off plan projects – from beachfront apartments and family villas to branded mansions by world famous designers. There’s an exciting array of options offering an excellent potential ROI and capital appreciation.

Whether you’ve invested before or are just looking for extra information, our team of experts are here to help you find the ideal property to match your budget and investment goals.

A leading global hub, Dubai continues to attract investors all over the world thanks to its visionary plans, booming population, world class education and healthcare, safe environment, and thriving economy. 

Investors can also benefit from:

Golden Visas
Competitive rental yields
Tax-free income
Attractive business environment
Explore some of the most sought after destinations for property buyers.
Learn more about Dubai’s world famous developers and what makes them unique.

During your free consultation with one of our experts, you will discuss your investment goals and ideal timeline. They will ask about your needs, answer any questions, and update you on the current market conditions. After that, your agent will come back to you with suggestions, an investment strategy, and tailored advice.
With proficiency in 20 languages and decades of combined experience, our team of experts will help you unlock opportunities and reach your investment goals.
Tune into our podcast to get market updates, industry insights, and expert advice for every step of the journey.
Register to receive market reports and our monthly investment newsletter with handpicked projects, podcasts, and market insights.

settings.question: What real estate services do JCON Properties offer?
settings.answer: Our services include Residential Sales and Leasing, Holiday Rentals, Off Plan properties and Investments, Property Management, and Commercial Sales and Commercial Leasing. We also support clients through our home maintenance company Breathe, and our project management group Bauhaus is on hand for property renovations, design, upgrades, and more. If there's something we don't cover, our extensive network of partners can take care of it – including conveyancing support, mortgage solutions, currency services, professional furnishing, and more.

settings.question: Which Dubai communities do JCON Properties cover?
settings.answer: We cover 100+ communities, including waterfront destinations like Dubai Marina and Emaar Beachfront, serene communities such as Arabian Ranches, Jumeirah Golf Estates, and Dubai Hills Estate, and key tourist locations like Downtown Dubai, Palm Jumeirah, and Jumeirah Beach Residence (JBR).

settings.question: Is JCON Properties Group a leading real estate agency?
settings.answer: We're proud to be a leading, award winning real estate agency with over 10 years of experience and a strong team of 220+ property experts. Our client focused approach has led us to where we are, because while others are fighting to get the deal, we have our eyes set on supporting each person and building long lasting relationships.

settings.question: Can JCON Properties help me with real estate investments?
settings.answer:
Yes. Whether you're looking to invest in a ready property or are searching for an off plan investment, our property experts are on hand to help you find the best opportunities that suit your needs.

Maybe you're a seasoned investor, or perhaps you just want some extra info – whatever your case, we'll provide useful advice to steer you in the right direction.

settings.question: Can JCON Properties manage my property?
settings.answer: Luckily, our Property Management department can take the weight off your shoulders. From leased apartments and villas to entire buildings, we'll take care of general maintenance, repairs, cleaning, and even look after your tenants. Get started here.

settings.question: Do JCON Properties provide insights into Dubai's real estate market?
settings.answer: Absolutely. We'll take every opportunity we can get to inform you of the latest insights, market news, and relevant data. No matter your goal, the best decision is always the one that's backed up by accurate information and professional advice – so leave it to us to keep you in the loop of the current market with guides, blog posts, market reports, and more.

settings.question: Do JCON Properties Property Consultants provide a free consultation?
settings.answer: Yes – we're always happy to meet new people and talk about real estate (it's kind of our thing). We offer free consultations through different channels like phone calls, WhatsApp messages, video calls or in-person meetings. Depending on your specific goals we'll get you through to a dedicated specialist. Just get in touch to book your preferred date and time.
